meanings.definition: The guidance provided by a mentor.
meanings.sent1: My mentorship helped me learn new skills.
meanings.sent2: She received mentorship from an experienced professional.
meanings.sent3: The mentorship I received was like having a personal teacher.
meanings.sent4: In the world of career growth, mentorship is the compass guiding you.
meanings.sent5: The mentorship was like a light in the darkness, showing me the way forward.

meanings.definition: The relationship between a mentor and a mentee.
meanings.sent1: Their mentorship was built on trust and respect.
meanings.sent2: The mentorship between them was strong and supportive.
meanings.sent3: The mentorship between the cat and the mouse was quite unusual.
meanings.sent4: The mentorship was a bridge connecting two different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The mentorship blossomed into a beautiful friendship over time.
